tosdr.case: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
quoteText:
Additionally, some Internet browsers have a "Do Not Track" feature that lets you tell websites that you do not want to have your online activities tracked.
Currently, We do not respond to “Do Not Track” signals because We are trying to provide you with a personalized experience.
